archimate:Requirement.name: IA-3(3): Device Identification and Authentication | Dynamic Address Allocation
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Where addresses are allocated dynamically, standardize dynamic address allocation lease information and the lease duration assigned to devices in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined lease information and lease duration]; and (b) Audit lease information when assigned to a device.

properties.value: The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) is an example of a means by which clients can dynamically receive network address assignments.
